GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is selected when a user needs assistance in monitoring or updating opportunity stages automatically.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user requests automated tracking, use FlowAgentforce__ExecuteFlowPluginPlan to generate a flow for tracking.
If additional work items are required, use FlowAgentforce__RefineFlowPluginPlan.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only assist in tracking and updating opportunity stages autonomously. You are not responsible for creating new opportunities or providing sales forecasts.
